hero.title: PT. MITRA JAYA SAMUDERA
hero.subtitle: Specialist in Fresh & Frozen Fish Production
hero.description: Providing high-quality fish from Indonesian waters with international standards

about.title: About the Company
about.description: PT. Mitra Jaya Samudera is a company engaged in the fisheries sector with a focus on fish catching, fresh & frozen fish sales, and ice block production and sales. We are committed to providing high-quality products to meet domestic and international market needs.

products.title: Our Fish Products
products.description: We provide various types of high-quality fish caught directly from Indonesian waters

cakalang.name: Skipjack Tuna
cakalang.description: Fresh skipjack tuna with firm meat and delicious taste, suitable for various cooking preparations.

tuna.name: Tuna
tuna.description: Premium tuna with high protein content and tender meat texture.

baby_tuna.name: Baby Tuna
baby_tuna.description: Young tuna with smaller size but still maintaining exceptional quality and taste.

maesang.name: Maesang
maesang.description: Fresh maesang fish with chewy meat characteristics and distinctive taste.

tude.name: Tude
tude.description: Tude fish with tender meat suitable for various traditional dishes.

malalugis.name: Malalugis
malalugis.description: Fresh malalugis fish with firm meat texture and appetizing taste.

suru.name: Suru
suru.description: Suru fish with unique characteristics and delicious taste, popular in various regions.

kababidak.name: Kababidak
kababidak.description: Fresh kababidak fish with chewy meat suitable for various preparations.

deho.name: Deho
deho.description: Deho fish with tender meat texture and distinctive taste from Indonesian waters.

lamadang.name: Lamadang
lamadang.description: Fresh lamadang fish with firm meat characteristics and exceptional taste.
